aircraft.value: Pelican Cargo - AC-3371-884 at Zone-3 Facility

defect_observed.value: Exhaust gas temperature margin reduction. Defect found during scheduled maintenance.

root_cause.value: Software algorithm error in control logic implementation

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Exhaust System component. Physical examination revealed signs of wear and degradation.

corrective_action.value: Conduct non-destructive testing to verify structural integrity

remarks_investigation.value: Complete defect analysis performed. Lessons learned documented.

remarks_design.value: Design assessment confirms component operated within specified limits. Recommend enhanced inspection protocol. Date: 16/03/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Air Cmde R.K. Joshi

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Manufacturing quality documentation reviewed. No deviations noted. Concur with investigation findings. Date: 17/03/2023 Signature: Dr. A.K. Sharma

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) User perspective considered. Recommend update to operating procedures based on lessons learned. Date: 20/03/2023 Signature: Sqn Ldr A.R. Desai

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality assurance framework assessed. Investigation process followed established protocols. Findings are valid. Date: 19/03/2023 Signature: Eng. K.N. Iyer

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Certification review completed. Proposed modifications do not affect type design approval. Acceptable. Date: 21/03/2023 Signature: Gp Capt N.R. Kumar
